N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.7 - Trucks and buses required to keep right; maintain distance

State Regulations
(a) When two or
more lanes and booths are open at the toll plaza, trucks and buses shall use
the lane and booth that is open at the farthest point on the right-hand side
unless instructed otherwise by an authority employee. For the purposes of this
section, the right-hand side shall be as the vehicle is approaching the plaza
or booth prior to paying the toll prescribed. (b) All commercial trucks and buses shall
maintain a distance of 500 feet (150 meters) between other like vehicles
traveling in the same direction while on the bridges. Notes
